s: December 3, 2024 - Starting August 31, 2020, Amazon introduced new size attributes as optional in listings for Dress, Sweater, Coat, Shirt, Tunic, and Kurta product types. t: Amazon Launches New Size Chart Self-Serve Tool for Brand Registry Members | Swipe Insight
s: May 23, 2024 - New Amazon Size Chart Self-Serve Tool allows Brand Registry members to add or modify size charts effortlessly. Eligible brands get automatic access. The tool lets you upload or edit size charts independently, download templates, and preview before publishing.

t: Amazon Ad Sizes & Best Practices 2024
s: June 21, 2024 - Ecommerce - The Amazon Ad Sizes are specifically designed for advertising on the Amazon platform. These ad sizes are used to promote products, brands, and services on Amazon's website and affiliated sites. They are crucial for reaching a wide audience of potential customers and driving sales.
